## Events namespace

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BlockBase](./blockly.events_namespace.blockbase_class.md) | Abstract class for a block event. |
|  [BlockChange](./blockly.events_namespace.blockchange_class.md) | Class for a block change event. |
|  [BlockCreate](./blockly.events_namespace.blockcreate_class.md) | Class for a block creation event. |
|  [BlockDelete](./blockly.events_namespace.blockdelete_class.md) | Class for a block deletion event. |
|  [BlockDrag](./blockly.events_namespace.blockdrag_class.md) | Class for a block drag event. |
|  [BlockMove](./blockly.events_namespace.blockmove_class.md) | Class for a block move event. Created before the move. |
|  [BubbleOpen](./blockly.events_namespace.bubbleopen_class.md) | Class for a bubble open event. |
|  [Click](./blockly.events_namespace.click_class.md) | Class for a click event. |
|  [CommentBase](./blockly.events_namespace.commentbase_class.md) | Abstract class for a comment event. |
|  [CommentChange](./blockly.events_namespace.commentchange_class.md) | Class for a comment change event. |
|  [CommentCreate](./blockly.events_namespace.commentcreate_class.md) | Class for a comment creation event. |
|  [CommentDelete](./blockly.events_namespace.commentdelete_class.md) | Class for a comment deletion event. |
|  [CommentMove](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class.md) | Class for a comment move event. Created before the move. |
|  [FinishedLoading](./blockly.events_namespace.finishedloading_class.md) | Class for a finished loading event. Used to notify the developer when the workspace has finished loading (i.e domToWorkspace). Finished loading events do not record undo or redo. |
|  [MarkerMove](./blockly.events_namespace.markermove_class.md) | Class for a marker move event. |
|  [ProcedureBase](./blockly.events_namespace.procedurebase_class.md) | The base event for an event associated with a procedure. |
|  [ProcedureChangeReturn](./blockly.events_namespace.procedurechangereturn_class.md) | Represents a procedure's return type/status changing. |
|  [ProcedureCreate](./blockly.events_namespace.procedurecreate_class.md) | Represents a procedure data model being created. |
|  [ProcedureDelete](./blockly.events_namespace.proceduredelete_class.md) | Represents a procedure data model being deleted. |
|  [ProcedureEnable](./blockly.events_namespace.procedureenable_class.md) | Represents a procedure data model being enabled or disabled. |
|  [ProcedureParameterBase](./blockly.events_namespace.procedureparameterbase_class.md) | The base event for an event associated with a procedure parameter. |
|  [ProcedureParameterCreate](./blockly.events_namespace.procedureparametercreate_class.md) | Represents a parameter being added to a procedure. |
|  [ProcedureParameterDelete](./blockly.events_namespace.procedureparameterdelete_class.md) | Represents a parameter being removed from a procedure. |
|  [ProcedureParameterRename](./blockly.events_namespace.procedureparameterrename_class.md) | Represents a parameter of a procedure being renamed. |
|  [ProcedureRename](./blockly.events_namespace.procedurerename_class.md) | Represents a procedure being renamed. |
|  [Selected](./blockly.events_namespace.selected_class.md) | Class for a selected event. |
|  [ThemeChange](./blockly.events_namespace.themechange_class.md) | Class for a theme change event. |
|  [ToolboxItemSelect](./blockly.events_namespace.toolboxitemselect_class.md) | Class for a toolbox item select event. |
|  [TrashcanOpen](./blockly.events_namespace.trashcanopen_class.md) | Class for a trashcan open event. |
|  [Ui](./blockly.events_namespace.ui_class.md) | Class for a UI event. |
|  [UiBase](./blockly.events_namespace.uibase_class.md) | Base class for a UI event. UI events are events that don't need to be sent over the wire for multi-user editing to work (e.g. scrolling the workspace, zooming, opening toolbox categories). UI events do not undo or redo. |
|  [VarBase](./blockly.events_namespace.varbase_class.md) | Abstract class for a variable event. |
|  [VarCreate](./blockly.events_namespace.varcreate_class.md) | Class for a variable creation event. |
|  [VarDelete](./blockly.events_namespace.vardelete_class.md) | Class for a variable deletion event. |
|  [VarRename](./blockly.events_namespace.varrename_class.md) | Class for a variable rename event. |
|  [ViewportChange](./blockly.events_namespace.viewportchange_class.md) | Class for a viewport change event. |
